summary: Dr. Oluwatobi A. Yerokun, M.D. pled guilty to Conspiracy to Make False Statements Related to Health Care Matters (18 U.S.C. ยง 371). He signed orders for durable medical equipment and genetic testing, certifying medical necessity without patient contact or adequate review, facilitating fraudulent Medicare and Medicaid claims. As a result of this conviction for a crime involving moral turpitude, his Maryland medical license was suspended.
